--- named_schemas_drop_sequence.sql
DROP SEQUENCE sch1.sequence
--- AST
&ast.DropSequence{
  Drop:     0,
  IfExists: false,
  Name:     &ast.FQN{
    Schema: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 14,
      NameEnd: 18,
      Name:    "sch1",
    },
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 19,
      NameEnd: 27,
      Name:    "sequence",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP SEQUENCE sch1.sequence
